verses.roman:
paṇḍita kahena,--prabhu svatantra sarvajña-śiromaṇi
tāṅra sane 'haṭha' kari,--bhāla nāhi māni

synonyms: paṇḍita kahena—Gadādhara Paṇḍita said; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; svatantra—independent; sarvajña-śiromaṇi—the best of the omniscient; tāṅra sane—with Him; haṭha kari—if I talk on an equal level; bhāla—good; nāhi māni—I do not think it is.
translation: Gadādhara Paṇḍita said, "Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu is completely independent. He is the topmost omniscient personality. It would not look well for me to talk to Him as if His equal.
